head.title: The Way We Live Now Poll

hedline.hl1: The Way We Live Now Poll

abstract.p: Janice Fuhrman letter on May 7 special issue holds Philip Weiss's problem is that he married two women who had not grown up

block.p: The problem with Philip Weiss's marriage would seem to stem from his having married a woman who has not grown up -- a woman who claims she was ''recruited'' into marriage (not once, but twice!) and who says that ''mistresshood'' is a more desirable state than marriage (''Is This Marriage on the Rocks?''). Anyone who would strive to make a marriage work to vindicate herself, against the well-meaning criticisms of a scientist trying to help, is childishly defensive.
